full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Brocade SANnav Licenses
### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Reference Number**: SSC-24-00025326:T
* **Solicitation Title**: Brocade SANnav licenses 2023/24 
* **Publication Date**: January 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 29, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Requirements
The Government of Canada's Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting bids for Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance. The licenses are required for the period of February 1, 2024, to January 31, 2025.

### Submission Instructions
All bidders must register in the SSC Public Purchasing System (P2P) portal to submit their bids. After registering, bidders must access the P2P portal at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca) and click on the "Register Now" button. 

### Contract Description
The contract involves the provision of Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance. Bidders must submit their bids through the P2P portal by the closing date and time specified above. Submission through the P2P portal is mandatory. Amendments to the solicitation are available on the P2P portal.

### Contact Information
For questions or further information, please contact:
Sandra Ladouceur  
(613) 302-0766  
Fax: (613) 960-6026  
Email: (None)  

### Attachments
The following documents are available on the P2P portal:
* SSC Brocade SANnav licenses 2023/24 Amendment 000
* SSC Brocade SANnav licenses 2023/24 Amendment 000 French version  

Note to writer: The UNSPSC code, trade agreements, and regions of opportunity were not included in the rewritten entry as they don't seem to add value to the main solicitation information. If required, you can include them at the end of entry or in an added section.
